name: The Birth of a Mrs
overview: Life is all about timing, and just when Yeong Hee thought that she may miss the timing for marriage, she hears these glad words, “Let's get married”. Marriage is all but a fantasy, but what is it like before the actual wedding ceremony? A must-watch for any future brides and grooms. a story of marriage customs, meetings between the in-laws, wedding gifts, family offerings, the marriage proposal, and everything that comes along with the long-awaited “I do!” The real story of romance and reality leading up to marriage begins!
